sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate>
		var post = "/catalog_home.do?v=1$[AMP]sysparm_catalog=";
		var pre = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
		var url;
		
		var catalog = new GlideRecord('sc_catalog');
		catalog.addQuery('title','Citrix Automation Catalog');
		catalog.query();
		if(catalog.next()){
			post += catalog.sys_id+"$[AMP]sysparm_catalog_view=catalog_citrix_automation_catalog";
			url = pre+post;		
		}else{
			url = null;
		}
		gs.setRedirect(url);
		
	</g2:evaluate>
	
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: redirect_to_catalog
